cmds_help_avatar:
Usage: r!avatar @user
Example: r!avatar @MTGPROD

Rem will display you the avatar that matches, either yours or the mentioned member
cmds_help_8ball:
Usage: r!8ball <text>
Example: r!8ball i am incredible ?

Rem send a random responce (8 responce possible)
cmds_help_ascii:
Usage: r!ascii <text>
Example: r!ascii Hello everyone

Rem will send you your text in ASCII
cmds_help_anime:
Usage: r!animes <anime name>
Example: r!animes Darling in the FranXX

Rem is going to try to find you the anime to search
cmds_help_b64encode:
Usage: r!b64 encode <text>
Example: r!b64encode Hello world

Rem will encode the <text> you entered.
cmds_help_b64decode:
Usage: r!b64 decode <b64code>
Example: r!b64decode SGVsbG8gd29ybGQ=

Rem will decode the base64 code you have entered.
cmds_help_b64:
Usage: r!b64 encode | decode <text>
Example: r!b64 encode hello

This command encode or decode b64 language.
cmds_help_ban:
Usage: r!ban @user
 Example: @MTGPROD

Rem will ban the mentioned user, you will need a #logs channel to use this command.
cmds_help_botstats:
Usage: r!botstats
Example: r!botstats

Rem you will see these stats.
cmds_help_calc:
Usage: r!calc <calculation>
Example: r!calc 7 * 9

Rem will give you the result.
cmds_help_cat:
Usage: r!cat Example: r!cat

Rem you will display a cute little cat.
cmds_help_changelog:
Usage: r!changelog
Example: r!changelog

 Display the changlog of Rem.
cmds_help_color:
Usage: r!color <colorname> Example: r!color blue

Rem will give you the color among the list of colors available, using r!colors.
cmds_help_colors:
Usage: r!colors
Example: r!colors

Rem displays all available colors, to add a color you need to create a role that starts with '#', for you given the color you will have to use the command r!color.
cmds_help_csgo:
Usage: r!csgo <STEAMID64> Example: r!csgo Zerotwo

Rem will display the stats of the requesting player on csgo.
cmds_help_dashboard:
Usage: r!dashboard
Example: r!dashboard

Rem you will display its stats in real time.
cmds_help_eval:
Usage: r!eval <code>
Example: r!eval client.users.size

Allows to execute code in a sandbox environment.
cmds_help_feedback:
Usage: r!feedback <feed>
Example: r!feedback Rem is cool !

Allows you to give your opinion to Rem's developers.
cmds_help_findusers:
Usage: r!findusers <username>
Example: Allows you to give your opinion to Rem's developers.
cmds_help_google:
Usage: r!google <research>
Example: r!google thot

Rem will google for you.
cmds_help_guildname:
Usage: r!guildname <name>
Example: r!guildname MTG's Laboratories

Rem will change the name of your server, this requests MANAGE_GUILD permission.
cmds_help_hug:
Usage: r!hug @user
Example: r!hug @MTGPROD

Allows you to make a virtual hug !
cmds_help_invite:
Usage: r!invite
Example: r!invite

Allows you to invite Rem to your server or go to the support server.
cmds_help_kiss:
Usage: r!kiss @user
Example: r!kiss @MTGPROD

Allows you to make a virtual kiss.
cmds_help_leave:
Usage: r!leave
Example: r!leave

Rem leave the current voice channel
cmds_help_me:
Usage: r!me
Example: r!me

Displays basic information about your account discord.
cmds_help_memes:
Usage: r!memes
Example r!memes

Displays a random memes.
cmds_help_mute:
Usage: r!mute @user
Example r!mute @MTGPROD

Mute a user by preventing him from sending messages or reactions.
cmds_help_neohelp:
Usage: r!neohelp
Example r!neohelp

Displays a version of the r!help but deprecated.
cmds_help_newchannel:
Usage: r!newchannel <name> <type>
Example r!newchannel super-channel text

Created for you a channel, in <type> you have the choice between voice/text/category.
cmds_help_newemoji:
Usage: r!newemoji <url> <name>
Example r!newemoji https://cdn.discordapp.com/emojis/492976351322570762.png?v=1 MDR

Created an emoji from the url of an image only, gifs are not supported.
cmds_help_newrole:
Usage: r!newrole <name> <#color> <mentionable> <hoist> <position>
Example r!newrole White #FFFFF false true 12

Created a role with the defined parameters.
cmds_help_nick:
Usage: r!nick <nick>
Example: r!nick thot

Gives you a nickname, this command asks for MANAGE_NICKNAMES permission.
cmds_help_pause:
Usage: r!pause
Example: r!pause

Pause the played sound.
cmds_help_ping:
Usage: r!ping
Example: r!ping

Display the latency of Rem.
cmds_help_play:
Usage: r!play <url>
Example: r!play https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v2mgwxGN058

Play a sound from youtube, needs the sound url.
cmds_help_poll:
Usage: r!poll <question>
Example: r!poll Deltarune is good ?

Created a survey with a question you choose, reactions will be automatically bet so that server members can answer your question.
cmds_help_post:
Usage: r!post <id>
Example: r!post 56

Displays a post available in a database there are 100 posts
cmds_help_queue:
Usage: r!queue
Example: r!queue

Display the queue of songs.
cmds_help_reboot:
Usage: r!reboot
Example: r!reboot

Reboot Rem.
cmds_help_reload:
Usage: r!reload <command>
Example: r!reload

Reload a command.
cmds_help_bugreport:
Usage: r!bugreport <bug>
Example: r!bugreport I found a bug: the bot will crashe when i use any commands

Send me a message with your bug report.
cmds_help_resume:
Usage: r!resume
Example: r!resume

Resume the song.
cmds_help_roleinfo:
Usage: r!roleinfo @role
Example: r!roleinfo @ASMR

Displays information about a role, or if you have no settings it will display the information of the highest role you have
cmds_help_say:
Usage: r!say <text>
Example: r!say Hello i am Rem

Speak instead of Rem.
cmds_help_search:
Usage: r!search <search>
Example: r!search Rude buster

Allows you to search for videos on youtube so you can play one.
cmds_help_setgame:
Usage: r!setgame <game>
Example: r!setgame

Set the game of Rem.
cmds_help_setregion:
Usage: r!setregion <region>
Example r!setregion japan

Allows you to change the server region you have the choice between: japan, singapore, eu-central, us-central, london, eu-west, amsterdam, brazil, us-west, hongkong, us-south, southafrica, us-east, sydney, frankfurt, russia. This command requires permission: MANAGE_GUILD
cmds_help_setrolename:
Usage: r!setrolename
Example: r!setrolename

Command not implemented yet.
cmds_help_skip:
Usage: r!skip
Example: r!skip

Skip the current song.
cmds_help_snipe:
Usage: r!snipe @user
Example: r!snipe @MTG

Snipe a user.
cmds_help_status:
Usage: r!status
Example: r!stauts idle

Change the status of Rem.
cmds_help_suggestion:
Usage: r!suggestion <suggestion>
Example r!suggestion please add a kill command

Send a suggestion.
cmds_help_sync:
Usage: r!sync
Example: r!sync

Sync Rem.
cmds_help_type:
Usage: r!type
Example: r!type

TEST COMMAND
cmds_help_unban:
Usage: r!unban @user
Example: r!unban @MTG

Unban a user.
cmds_help_unmute:
Usage: r!unmute @user
Example: r!unmute @MTG

Unmute a user.
cmds_help_urban:
Usage: r!urban <search>
Example: r!urban book

Search in the urban dictoinary.
cmds_help_voicekick:
Usage: r!voicekick @user
Example r!voicekick @MTG

Kick a member in a voice channel.
cmds_help_volume:
Usage: r!volume <number>
Example: r!volume 800

Change the volume of the song.
cmds_help_topic:
Usage: r!topic <text>
Example: r!topic super topic

Rem change the topic of the channel, require MANAGE_CHANNELS permission for work.
cmds_help_presidentext:
Usage: r!presidentext <text>
Example: r!presidentext Download trump is alive

Display a text with PresidentAlerte message template.
cmds_help_cookie:
Usage: r!cookie @user
Example: r!cookie @MTG

Give you a cookie to a user.
cmds_help_osu:
Usage: r!osu [mode] <username>
Example: r!osu mania MTGPROD

Displays the stats of a player in the OSU! game.
cmds_help_pin:
Usage: r!pin <message id>
Example: r!pin 523250190254080030

Pin messages by ID.
cmds_help_money_give:
Usage: r!money give <amount> @user
Example: r!money give 400 @MTG

Give some money to a user.
